The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 24 December is 13,217 (1,529.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 December, there were 1,830 new confirmed cases (211.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 December, there were 977 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 87% (853 extra cases).
